main.name: Dino Marchiori
main.description: I am a full stack developer! Always hungry for knowledge.
main.bio: I'm a developer that comes from a business and finance background. Through my past experiences, I can balance the need of users and businesses to understand their pain points and contribute as a developer to solve their issues. I've worked with a wide range of people from different backgrounds and demographics. This has enabled me to adapt and become flexible in the workplace.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.
